inclusion.criterion: Advanced Pulmonary disease using home oxygen therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Have a diagnosis of chronic hypoxemia proven by blood gas analysis on room air PaO2 ≤ 55 mmHg or SaO2 ≤ 88; or PaO2 between 55 and 60 mmHg or SaO2 between 89 and 90%
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: evidence of pulmonary hypertension, or polycythemia (hematocrit> 55%) as GOLD - Global Obstructive Lung Disease, 2015;
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: No records found Patients who failed to perform the periodic reviews established by the team responsible
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has advanced pulmonary disease using home oxygen therapy, chronic hypoxemia, and evidence of pulmonary hypertension. However, patient failed to perform periodic reviews established by the team responsible.
